title: inktastic My Uncle Is a Police Officer Baby Bib
features: Made in the USA and Imported
This design is the perfect way for babies and children to show support for their police officer Uncle.
Our bibs are combed ring-spun cotton. Reinforced with a hook and loop closure. Created with only the finest and softest of materials that allow the little one to stay clean and comfortable.
Printed with the best direct to garment printing technology using only ECO-FRIENDLY ink, creating a safe and comfortable bib.
Our bibs are heat cured so the bibs are able to be washed countless of times and not show any fading, cracking, or loss of color.
Inktastic, is a family owned business who prints all products in the USA with pride and integrity ensuring the best customer experience from start to finish.
description: Celebrate your role model and the police officer in your life with My Uncle is a Police Officer Baby Bib, perfect for little kids who love their police force family member.
